features.name: Frontline Tank
features.description: Spend 3 Hope to clear 2 Armor Slots.

features.name: Combat Training
features.description: You gain a bonus to your damage thresholds equal to your level.

features.name: Reckless
features.description: Mark a Stress to gain advantage on an attack roll against an adversary within Melee range.

features.name: Versatile
features.description: You are able to adapt to a number of situations, drawing on your broad range of experiences.

features.name: Resourceful
features.description: When you would spend a Hope, you can mark a Stress instead.

character_traits.name: Vengeance
